attributes.action: Ensure EEC cars brought into the uk are registered at the port of entry to ensure license fee and mot are collected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: data from registration at port to be passed to dvla with details of driver and home address, if car still in UK after statutory period (any cars leaving the Uk would be logged at port of departure) then appropriate road license duty, and mot would then be required. This would ensure that these vehicles are road worthy and that the license fee is paid by all
